The employees there are also really nice! The first time I went there, I accidentally left my purse. When I called them, they had kept my purse behind the counter, and were really considerate about it. Love this place!!

We walk in and they great us right away. Ya he was busy but he was still made us feel welcomed. We choose it because they had vegan options so we checked it out. Well there they even told us they had vegan ranch. There vegan options are on the shy side but they were all delicious. For the non vegans everything else it good. We got the pizza and burger and they were so good.

This place is the best!!! It might not look like much but the food & the customer service is better than most places. I'm vegan & I felt really well taken care of, the guy working there was very attentive despite the fact he was running the whole place by himself! I was impressed. He even gave us samples of their vegan ricotta. For only 20 bucks we got 6 vegan garlic knots, a medium pizza w vegan cheese & 3 toppings, & 2 sides of vegan ranch. It was one of the best pizzas I've had in years and I've had my fair share of vegan pizzas. The only con was they didn't have any vegan proteins, but not a huge deal. A+ food A+ service 

Thanks pizza company!!!

Can I just say... Yum?! I loved the pizza place on 215/Flamingo that had these custom pizzas and now I found a replacement :) The Pizza Company offers vegan and gluten free options, and the employees were very helpful. I ordered a traditional crust, with vegan cheese ($2.00 more) and also vegan sausage and chicken. The vegan sausage is definitely the way to go! Really great service and some good pizza... It was a lot of food so I ate it over two days :)

I'm so excited for any company to support a easier time for all to live on this planet. Choosing to comsume less animals and their fluids is a easy choice when you head over to pizza company!!! They have quite a few vegan  options. Pizza, garlic knots, stromboli, browies and I  hear they made a vegan tiramisu!! They even make a vegan ranch in house!!! They also have a vegan burger and vegan bites i look forward to trying!! Staff is friendly place is clean. come check them out!!!

I am staying at the Hampton Inn just around the corner from the Pizza Company. I walled over last night. It is located next to an old Las Vegas strip center (which contains the Village Pub with it's excellent fish and chips). Pizza Company makes pizza the old fashioned, New York, thin crust well done, good sauce way. The taste is fantastic and the prices better than reasonable. 

My name is Tony so fuggedaboudit! Order from Pizza Company!

Best vegan pizza in Vegas!! My favorite is vegan cheese topped with fresh garlic and pineapple... Cannot go wrong with that combination! Pizza Company makes it PERFECT, and with their tasty dough and sauce, they blow all the other places out of the water!!

The staff are always friendly, as well, and that's something that I really appreciate.

We got a 14" pepperoni pizza I'd say it feeds 3 people. The pizza was good just needs more sauce and the crust was a bit hard. We liked it plus its close to the airport. Prices are good and afordable. The staff was super friendly I'd give them 5 stars but the crust kinda took it away. Still recommend it!!!!

I had high hopes for this place but I was let down. Wanted to grab some pizza and eat it at sunset Park. I placed my order through Yelp it was ready in thirty minutes. They did not put any utensils, napkins, red chilli flakes in the to go bag. I did not get the ranch I ordered. The pizza was relatively bland, I got a Hawaiian. The salad was good, I got the antipasto. Ordered a tirimisu because it was made in house. By far the grossest thing I have ever eaten. First, it was frozen;then it was covered in some old crusty cocoa powder. It was bland and completely inedible. I will not be back.

Love this place! They are friendly and helpful. Their customer service rocks! The food is delicious! I love their garlic knots and garlic knot sliders. They pepperoni bites are amazing. Their garlic fries are awesome. I cannot get enough of their tiramisu and cannolis.

Awesome selection of items. Love the Vegan options as well as delicious options for the meat eaters. Also love that Every time I visit here, the owner is right there cooking and doing everything like his workers. Great customer service and willing to customize ingredient variations.
Very nice spot! The vegan bites with vegan ranch dressing and marinara sauce were amazing. Food was fresh and the employees were very nice. Next time, I plan to try the pizza.

Definitely a hole-in-the-wall type place, but totally awesome! The customer service was excellen!. The Vegan Pizza was scrumptious. The Vegan Garlic Knots and Vegan Ranch were TO DIE FOR! Overall, we had a wonderful experience. I will definitely be back very soon!

Joey and crew put together a good tasting pizza and they've always been very friendly. However, the prices are just too high for what you're getting now in my opinion.

They upped the prices a few months ago which is understandable but now they've reduced the size as well. What used to be the large is now the XL, so you're paying the same price for a large, but you're getting a smaller pizza when you order the large.

With that being said, I still think they make a good pizza, but we'll be looking for cheaper options in the future.

This is a great place to have lunch, order to go, or even cater. the food is excellent, very fresh. Talking about its making my mouth water lol. In overall is great costumer service, very welcoming. I most definitely give it a 5 STAR!!!

In town for a tournament and Yelp'd to see a good pizza joint in the area... We brought 15 people and they did a great job getting the food right and on time.  I had a stromboli...which if you don't know... is basically a sandwich (just the meat and cheese) wrapped in pizza dough and baked!  Edible...but wouldn't order again.  Garlic knots were pretty good and pizza was pretty good!  Service was 5 stars!  Food was about 3 stars.  Location was 1 star...WTH?  Creepy much?  
Overall 3.5 stars for me... I'd return if close by otherwise I'd try other locations to see how they stand up.

Ordered a couple pizzas delivered. Delivery was fast and hot. Pizza was not bad. The crust is tough as leather. The toppings were not ample but sufficient. Somewhat pricey for what you get. Flavor was good.

Just wanted to say that these guys are awesome every time I order from them. They know my name, are always friendly and even indulge my little idiosyncrasies... (I like the jalapeños diced up instead of sliced.) Thanks guys for always being so rad and making the best pizza in Vegas! *I highly recommend the Hawaiian with jalapeños, garlic knots and the house made ranch is delicious!!

If you like less crust and enough toppings to satisfy, this is a decent pizza place...Enough so that I want to try more things on the menu.  The flavor of both the dough and sauce is good.  One in our party is used to true Italian pizza that is not "overdone" with crust and toppings, and he felt is was "authentic Italian".  Yes, I'm a fan and returning for more!
Delicious vegan pizza, garlic knots, and ranch sauce! Probably my favorite pick for a pizza place that has a vegan friendly option.

Well after hearing so much about this place because they have vegan options, I give them a try and Im so happy for it because is delicious.  I love the dough and crust of there vegan pizza, the garlic nuts is only bread and garlic but they are delicious and what I love the most was the vegan bites with the vegan ranch OMG I can  totally eat that every day that ranch is so good I need to get the recipe Lol. In comparation off all there menu the vegan options are very little and I wish they had different sauces for the pizzas like pesto or any white sauce but what they have right now fir non a vegan place it is fantastic, thank you for adding special items for vegans I really appreciate it and if I wasn't fat I totally would eat more often but I really have to control my self every time I pass by Lol.  My husband? not vegan,  like my pizza to and he actually had a regular pizza and he say it was pretty good so give them a try, they Worth it and  finally if you are a vegan tried it, it is really good, definitely coming back.

We had gone here curious of the vegan garlic knots.  After looking at the menu the gentleman behind the counter asked if we were vegan and then offered us a special they had going on.  An XL pizza with vegan cheese and 3 toppings with 12 garlic knots for $26.99.  Umm yeah!  Everything was delicious, both people working were friendly and went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied.  Having been dreamin about more vegan garlic knots since we left ..we will be back.

Definitely anyone who is looking for a authentic and fresh pizza this is the place!!!Great customer service as well with great vegan options...The veggie pizza with Daiya cheese and Silcillian thick crust pure amazing!!!!!!!

Probably the best vegan ziti I have had. I don't really like daiya so I used their homemade cashew ricotta instead of daiya cheese and it was awesome. The garlic knots were sooooo good. My husband had the vegan Stromboli and he was very impressed. The vegan ranch is a must too!  So happy they have vegan options that are yummy ;)

My wife and I moved to Vegas a little over a month ago and we were looking for a vegan pizza option. We found The Pizza Company online and saw that they had good reviews and vegan options. We brought our own block of Violife vegan cheese and asked Joey if he would be willing to use our cheese, he was more than willing to use the cheese we brought  with us. I can't say enough about The outstanding customer service we received. The pizza was delicious and the vegan garlic knots were amazing! Thank you so much Joey and Pizza Company for a wonderful and friendly experience and thank you for giving the vegan community another option!

Just had me a lunch spcl (2x slcs and a 12 0z can for $5 and change) and it was mediocre aaiight. It wouldn't hurt if the dude making the pies wear at least a pair of light plastic gloves if he's multi-tasking in touching the cash register and grabbing the counter pens, etc; They think they slick by chopping a full slice in 2 so the joint was about size of your palm of your hands that fit into a itty bitty pizza box. Probably it was their sauce but I found it a bit salty and it was HELLA greasy, had to go hit up Planet Fitness after. Comes down to getting simply what I paid for, but for over all courteous srvc, the 2 dudes there were super white people polite nice and not evil. Can't complain ;)

Just another Pizza of place in Vegas looks really old even is known that really old part of town plenty of parking in the front two empty business side by side it's kind of cool how you can go to the driveway to the apartment complex on the west side that way you can exit West on Sunset other than that yeah that's it

I've had the pizza, sausage roll, Stromboli, and sausage and peppers rustica.  I give all of them 5 stars except the pizza was 4 stars but that's just personal preference. If I could give more than 5 stars for service I would. Friendly, helpful, and after 4 visits the 3 different employees I dealt with, all acted like they owned the place.  That's a rare thing when you have employees with an ownership mentality these days. Awesome!

We love Pizza Company!! We pick up pizza from them almost every other week. Pizza is great! Also love their garlic knots and meatball sliders. It is usually ready pretty quickly and the owner is always super nice when I come in! Definitely would recommend!

This is my FAVORITE pizza place in vegas. And when I saw it only had 3 and a half star, I created a yelp account to review them. The pizza is fantastic, always fresh and delicious. The staff is nice and remembers me and my friends even when we hadn't come in to eat for months. The food comes out pretty quick for being made on the spot and they have a lot of food items on their menu besides pizza. I definitely recommend this place to everyone.

Best vegan pizza in town!  Besides the delicious pizza, they also have several other amazing vegan options like garlic knots and even vegan dessert!  The owner is the nicest down to earth guy!  He always makes time to say hello, and he remembers me everytime I call to place an order, and when I show up for pick up.  They are also very speedy, and the wait is usually only 15-20 minutes.  Definitely recommended for pizza lovers, vegan and omnivore!
